resetPasswordSingleAccount.subject: [firstName], your [accountName] password reset request
resetPasswordSingleAccount.body:
Hi [firstName],

We received a password reset request for [accountName] for you.

Click this link to reset your password (or copy and paste it into your browser):

[resetLink]

If you did not send this request, you can ignore this email.

If you need any assistance, please contact our support team.

Thank you!

[accountName]

Powered by RapidFunnel

resetPasswordSingleAccountOld.subject: [firstName], your [accountName] password reset request
resetPasswordSingleAccountOld.body:
Hi [firstName],

We received a password reset request for [accountName] for you.

Please enter this code in the app to set your new password: [secretCode]

If you did not send this request, you can ignore this email.

If you need any assistance, please contact our support team.

Thank you!

sendRequestCallEmailToUser.subject: [firstName], [contactFirstName] [contactLastName] has requested a call
sendRequestCallEmailToUser.body:
[firstName],

[contactFirstName] [contactLastName] has just asked for a follow-up phone call with you from the [requestCallSourcePage] page.

You can reach them at [contactPhoneNumber]

Great job prospecting! Be sure to contact them as soon as possible

Thanks!
The [accountName] Team

sendCtaEmailToUser.subject: [firstName], [contactFirstName] [contactLastName] has clicked on a button
sendCtaEmailToUser.body:
[firstName],

[contactFirstName] [contactLastName] just clicked on the link to [ctaLocation] from the [ctaPageName] page.

Here are their details, in case you want to follow up with them…

  • Email: [contactEmail]
  • Phone Number: [contactPhoneNumber]

Thanks!
The [accountName] Team
